clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Replacing Lantus With Basalin on the Glycemic Variation in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Replacing Lantus With Basalin on the Glycemic Variation in Patients

lead_sponsor.agency: Nanjing First Hospital, Nanjing Medical University

clinical_study.source: Nanjing First Hospital, Nanjing Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: The study will assess the glycemic variationusing continuous glucose monitoring system in type 2 diabetic patients with euglycemia control respectively when patients was treated with Basalin and one week after changing the insulin into Lantus.

detailed_description.textblock: The participants will take continuous glucose monitoring system for 3 days when they change the insulin into Lantus after reach euglycemia control with Basalin treatment for one week.

primary_outcome.description: The changes of glycemic variation before and after drug change

arm_group.description: the patients who are using Basalin treatment will use isodose of Lantus instead

intervention.description: continuous glucose monitoring system will used twice when patients are using Basalin and Lantus respectively to assess glycemic variation.

overall_official.affiliation: The First Affiliated Hospital with Nanjing Medical University
